fees.description:
There are no exit fees associated with this offer. We may vary the Charges and fees at any time by notice to you, including by message on your bill. Details about Charges and fees are set out under the terms and conditions of your Market Agreement.
Further information on our fees and charges is available at: http://tangoenergy.com/additional-charges
For payments made by MasterCard or Visa where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
For payments made by AMEX or any other payment where we incur a merchant services fee. Not applicable to direct debit payments by credit card or debit card.
$7.50 (exc. GST) if your payment is dishonoured or reversed.
$100.10 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees are set by your distributor or metering coordinator and will be quoted when requested.
$85.80 (inc. GST) Standard rates apply during business hours. Fees are set by your distributor or metering coordinator and will be quoted when requested.
Paper bill fee $3.30 (inc. GST) for each paper bill.

gasContract.terms: This contract is ongoing and may be terminated by you or us in accordance with the terms of our Market Agreement. The full terms and conditions applicable to this offer are available at http://tangoenergy.com/terms-and-conditions. For further information about this offer or our market terms, call Tango Energy on 1800 010 648.
gasContract.variation: Your gas rates (daily supply charge and usage rates) are fixed until at least 31st May 2024, subject to the above eligibility criteria. We will notify you about any variations to your prices in accordance with Energy Laws.

eligibility.information: This offer is only available to residential customers in the stated distribution area with an eligible meter type.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your gas rates (daily supply charge and usage rates) are fixed until at least 31st May 2024, subject to the above eligibility criteria. We will notify you about any variations to your prices in accordance with Energy Laws.
